#Text= Azula says : " Yes , I 'm so sorry to hear about your son , but really , what did you expect by just letting all the citizens leave ?

column1: #Text=My father has trusted you with this city and you 're making a mess of things !
#Text=Mai will handle the hostage trade so you do n't have a chance to mess it up .
#Text=I 'm renaming it in honor of my father , the city of New Ozai .
#Text=" Mai says : " You brought my brother ?
#Text=" Azula says : " I 'm sorry , but a thought just occurred to me .
#Text=" Mai says : " Of course not , Princess Azula .
#Text=" Azula says : " We 're trading a two year old for a king .
#Text=" Azula says : " It just does n't seem like a fair trade , does it ?
